notAMember.title: INTRODUCING THE FIRST CITIZEN PROGRAM
notAMember.subTitle: Be a part of Shoppers Stop’s Exclusive Membership Program and enjoy a host of benefits across both Shoppers Stop and SSBeauty

TierInfo.title: Let’s Get Started
TierInfo.SubText: Check Out The Different Types Of Cards

tier1.tierDescription:
Pay ₹350 for a 1-year membership and get:

  • 500 Bonus Points on enrolment
  • 2 First Citizen Reward Points on every purchase of ₹200
  • Extended membership benefits to up to 6 family members
  • Parking fee reimbursements with First Citizen Reward Points
tier1.quote: Psst! Shop Worth ₹15000 In A Year And Get Upgraded To Golden Glow.

tier1.tierDescription:
Pay ₹4500 for a 1-year membership and experience mind-blowing benefits:

  • 1000 Bonus Points on enrolment
  • Brand vouchers worth ₹3800
  • 20 First Citizen Reward Points on every purchase of ₹200
  • 5 Book Reward Points on every purchase of ₹200 at (company-owned)
  • Extended exchange period of up to 1 year
  • Personal shopper assistance
  • Black Assist – Direct access to the Store Manager
  • No queue billing
  • Access to First Citizen Black Lounge
  • Birthday and Anniversary surprises and offers
  • Extended membership benefits to up to 6 family members
  • Parking fee reimbursements with First Citizen Reward Points
tier1.quote: You’ll soon be hooked. Pay ₹4500 to renew your membership and don’t stop shopping!
